metadata.dc:author: Pando Pinto, J
Montero García, C
Vega Cuadri, A
Blasco Huelva, A
Gómez de Tejada, R
Torrico Román, P
metadata.dc:description: A case of laryngeal paraganglioma in a 65-year-old male was treated by supraglotic laryngectomy. This controversial tumor is analyzed and guidelines are given for its clinical and histological (immunohistochemical) diagnosis and treatment.
metadata.dc:title: Paraganglioma laríngeo.
[Laryngeal paraganglioma].
